name: the survival of masculinity
description:
Description

You are going through an important part of your life. Your first Job Interview!
That's why you're so nervous right now. Your stomach twisted like a poodle swept by a tornado.
If this goes well, you will get your first Job.
But you gonna fail.

Gameplay

In this game, you have to answer the question from your interviewer. Use WASD to choose your answer. Each answer will cost your macho points. To acquire macho points, you will need to follow the instruction on the right side. If you input ↑↓←→ arrows correctly, then you can get the 20 macho points, or lose 20 points if you missed.

The green bar in the middle is your interview score. The game ends when the bar is full or empty. Good luck.

Controls

W,A,S,D to answer the question
↑↓←→ to punch ur MASCULINITY
Click to pass the story

Credit
